name: clique
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small group of people who spend their time together and do not welcome other people into that group: Our golf club is run by a very unfriendly clique (of people). There's a clique at work that never talks/who never talk to anyone else. Synonym
coterieCompare
inner circle
